attributes.action: Ban the use of horses being used with the police.
attributes.additional_details: It is not fair on the horses to be used in crime prevention as they are being hurt and mistreated.
attributes.background: I want to ban the use of horses being used in the police force and being used to prevent riots or protests as I feel they’re being used for the wrong reasons and should not be used to prevent crime.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Ban the use of horses in the police force: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/325179

Ban the use of horses for crowd control: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/325275
